00047 
00048 std::string IdealWeightMeanRatio::get_name() const
00049   { return "Mean Ratio"; }
00050 
00051 int IdealWeightMeanRatio::get_negate_flag() const
00052   { return -1; }
00053 
00054 bool IdealWeightMeanRatio::evaluate( PatchData& pd, 
00055                                      size_t handle, 
00056                                      double& m, 
00057                                      MsqError& err )
00058 {
00059   const MsqMeshEntity* e = &pd.element_by_index(handle);
00060   EntityTopology topo = e->get_element_type();
00061 
00062   const MsqVertex *vertices = pd.get_vertex_array(err);
00063   const size_t *v_i = e->get_vertex_index_array();
00064 
00065   Vector3D n;                   // Surface normal for 2D objects
00066 
00067   // Prism and Hex element descriptions
00068   static const int locs_pri[6][4] = {{0, 1, 2, 3}, {1, 2, 0, 4},
00069                                      {2, 0, 1, 5}, {3, 5, 4, 0},
00070                                      {4, 3, 5, 1}, {5, 4, 3, 2}};
00071   static const int locs_hex[8][4] = {{0, 1, 3, 4}, {1, 2, 0, 5},
00072                                      {2, 3, 1, 6}, {3, 0, 2, 7},
00073                                      {4, 7, 5, 0}, {5, 4, 6, 1},
00074                                      {6, 5, 7, 2}, {7, 6, 4, 3}};
00075 
00076   const Vector3D d_con(1.0, 1.0, 1.0);
00077 
00078   int i;
00079 
00080   m = 0.0;
00081   bool metric_valid = false;
00082   switch(topo) {
00083   case TRIANGLE:
00084     pd.get_domain_normal_at_element(e, n, err); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00085     n = n / n.length();         // Need unit normal
00086     mCoords[0] = vertices[v_i[0]];
00087     mCoords[1] = vertices[v_i[1]];
00088     mCoords[2] = vertices[v_i[2]];
00089     metric_valid = m_fcn_2e(m, mCoords, n, a2Con, b2Con, c2Con);
00090     if (!metric_valid) return false;
00091     break;
00092     
00093   case QUADRILATERAL:
00094     pd.get_domain_normal_at_element(e, n, err); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00095     for (i = 0; i < 4; ++i) {
00096       n = n / n.length();       // Need unit normal
00097       mCoords[0] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][0]]];
00098       mCoords[1] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][1]]];
00099       mCoords[2] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][2]]];
00100       metric_valid = m_fcn_2i(mMetrics[i], mCoords, n, 
00101                               a2Con, b2Con, c2Con, d_con);
00102       if (!metric_valid) return false;
00103     }
00104     m = average_metrics(mMetrics, 4, err); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00105     break;
00106 
00107   case TETRAHEDRON:
00108     mCoords[0] = vertices[v_i[0]];
00109     mCoords[1] = vertices[v_i[1]];
00110     mCoords[2] = vertices[v_i[2]];
00111     mCoords[3] = vertices[v_i[3]];
00112     metric_valid = m_fcn_3e(m, mCoords, a3Con, b3Con, c3Con);
00113     if (!metric_valid) return false;
00114     break;
00115 
00116   case PYRAMID:
00117     for (i = 0; i < 4; ++i) {
00118       mCoords[0] = vertices[v_i[ i     ]];
00119       mCoords[1] = vertices[v_i[(i+1)%4]];
00120       mCoords[2] = vertices[v_i[(i+3)%4]];
00121       mCoords[3] = vertices[v_i[ 4     ]];
00122       metric_valid = m_fcn_3p(mMetrics[i], mCoords, a3Con, b3Con, c3Con);
00123       if (!metric_valid) return false;
00124     }
00125     m = average_metrics(mMetrics, 4, err); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00126     break;
00127 
00128   case PRISM:
00129     for (i = 0; i < 6; ++i) {
00130       mCoords[0] = vertices[v_i[locs_pri[i][0]]];
00131       mCoords[1] = vertices[v_i[locs_pri[i][1]]];
00132       mCoords[2] = vertices[v_i[locs_pri[i][2]]];
00133       mCoords[3] = vertices[v_i[locs_pri[i][3]]];
00134       metric_valid = m_fcn_3w(mMetrics[i], mCoords, a3Con, b3Con, c3Con);
00135       if (!metric_valid) return false;
00136     }
00137     m = average_metrics(mMetrics, 6, err); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00138     break;
00139 
00140   case HEXAHEDRON:
00141     for (i = 0; i < 8; ++i) {
00142       mCoords[0] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][0]]];
00143       mCoords[1] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][1]]];
00144       mCoords[2] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][2]]];
00145       mCoords[3] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][3]]];
00146       metric_valid = m_fcn_3i(mMetrics[i], mCoords, 
00147                               a3Con, b3Con, c3Con, d_con);
00148       if (!metric_valid) return false;
00149     }
00150     m = average_metrics(mMetrics, 8, err); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00151     break;
00152 
00153   default:
00154     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT,
00155                     "Element type (%d) not supported in IdealWeightMeanRatio",
00156                     (int)topo);
00157     return false;
00158   } // end switch over element type
00159   return true;
00160 }
00161 
00162 bool IdealWeightMeanRatio::evaluate_with_gradient( PatchData& pd,
00163                     size_t handle,
00164                     double& m,
00165                     std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00166                     std::vector<Vector3D>& g,
00167                     MsqError& err )
00168 {
00169 //  FUNCTION_TIMER_START(__FUNC__);
00170   const MsqMeshEntity* e = &pd.element_by_index(handle);
00171   EntityTopology topo = e->get_element_type();
00172 
00173   if (!analytical_average_gradient() &&
00174       topo != TRIANGLE &&
00175       topo != TETRAHEDRON) {
00176     static bool print = true;
00177     if (print) {
00178       MSQ_DBGOUT(1) << "Analyical gradient not available for selected averaging scheme. "
00179                     << "Using (possibly much slower) numerical approximation of gradient"
00180                     << " of quality metric. " << std::endl;
00181       print = false;
00182     }
00183     return QualityMetric::evaluate_with_gradient( pd, handle, m, indices, g, err );
00184   }
00185 
00186   const MsqVertex *vertices = pd.get_vertex_array(err);
00187   const size_t *v_i = e->get_vertex_index_array();
00188 
00189   Vector3D n;                   // Surface normal for 2D objects
00190 
00191   //double   nm, t=0;
00192 
00193   // Prism and Hex element descriptions
00194   static const int locs_pri[6][4] = {{0, 1, 2, 3}, {1, 2, 0, 4},
00195                                      {2, 0, 1, 5}, {3, 5, 4, 0},
00196                                      {4, 3, 5, 1}, {5, 4, 3, 2}};
00197   static const int locs_hex[8][4] = {{0, 1, 3, 4}, {1, 2, 0, 5},
00198                                      {2, 3, 1, 6}, {3, 0, 2, 7},
00199                                      {4, 7, 5, 0}, {5, 4, 6, 1},
00200                                      {6, 5, 7, 2}, {7, 6, 4, 3}};
00201 
00202   const Vector3D d_con(1.0, 1.0, 1.0);
00203 
00204   int i;
00205 
00206   bool metric_valid = false;
00207   const uint32_t fm = fixed_vertex_bitmap( pd, e, indices );
00208 
00209   m = 0.0;
00210 
00211   switch(topo) {
00212   case TRIANGLE:
00213     pd.get_domain_normal_at_element(e, n, err); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00214     n = n / n.length();         // Need unit normal
00215     mCoords[0] = vertices[v_i[0]];
00216     mCoords[1] = vertices[v_i[1]];
00217     mCoords[2] = vertices[v_i[2]];
00218     g.resize(3);
00219     if (!g_fcn_2e(m, arrptr(g), mCoords, n, a2Con, b2Con, c2Con)) return false;
00220     break;
00221 
00222   case QUADRILATERAL:
00223     pd.get_domain_normal_at_element(e, n, err); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00224     n /= n.length();    // Need unit normal
00225     for (i = 0; i < 4; ++i) {
00226       mCoords[0] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][0]]];
00227       mCoords[1] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][1]]];
00228       mCoords[2] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][2]]];
00229       if (!g_fcn_2i(mMetrics[i], mGradients+3*i, mCoords, n,
00230                     a2Con, b2Con, c2Con, d_con)) return false;
00231     }
00232     
00233     g.resize(4);
00234     m = average_corner_gradients( QUADRILATERAL, fm, 4,
00235                                   mMetrics, mGradients, 
00236                                   arrptr(g), err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00237     break;
00238 
00239   case TETRAHEDRON:
00240     mCoords[0] = vertices[v_i[0]];
00241     mCoords[1] = vertices[v_i[1]];
00242     mCoords[2] = vertices[v_i[2]];
00243     mCoords[3] = vertices[v_i[3]];
00244     g.resize(4);
00245     metric_valid = g_fcn_3e(m, arrptr(g), mCoords, a3Con, b3Con, c3Con);
00246     if (!metric_valid) return false;
00247     break;
00248 
00249   case PYRAMID:
00250     for (i = 0; i < 4; ++i) {
00251       mCoords[0] = vertices[v_i[ i     ]];
00252       mCoords[1] = vertices[v_i[(i+1)%4]];
00253       mCoords[2] = vertices[v_i[(i+3)%4]];
00254       mCoords[3] = vertices[v_i[ 4     ]];
00255       metric_valid = g_fcn_3p(mMetrics[i], mGradients+4*i, mCoords, a3Con, b3Con, c3Con);
00256       if (!metric_valid) return false;
00257     }
00258     g.resize(5);
00259     m = average_corner_gradients( PYRAMID, fm, 4,
00260                                   mMetrics, mGradients,
00261                                   arrptr(g), err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00262     break;
00263     
00264   case PRISM:
00265     for (i = 0; i < 6; ++i) {
00266       mCoords[0] = vertices[v_i[locs_pri[i][0]]];
00267       mCoords[1] = vertices[v_i[locs_pri[i][1]]];
00268       mCoords[2] = vertices[v_i[locs_pri[i][2]]];
00269       mCoords[3] = vertices[v_i[locs_pri[i][3]]];
00270       if (!g_fcn_3w(mMetrics[i], mGradients+4*i, mCoords, 
00271                     a3Con, b3Con, c3Con)) return false;
00272     }
00273     g.resize(6);
00274     m = average_corner_gradients( PRISM, fm, 6,
00275                                   mMetrics, mGradients,
00276                                   arrptr(g), err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00277     break;
00278 
00279   case HEXAHEDRON:
00280     for (i = 0; i < 8; ++i) {
00281       mCoords[0] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][0]]];
00282       mCoords[1] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][1]]];
00283       mCoords[2] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][2]]];
00284       mCoords[3] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][3]]];
00285       if (!g_fcn_3i(mMetrics[i], mGradients+4*i, mCoords, 
00286                     a3Con, b3Con, c3Con, d_con)) return false;
00287     }
00288     g.resize(8);
00289     m = average_corner_gradients( HEXAHEDRON, fm, 8,
00290                                   mMetrics, mGradients,
00291                                   arrptr(g), err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00292      break;
00293 
00294   default:
00295     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT,
00296                     "Element type (%d) not supported in IdealWeightMeanRatio",
00297                     (int)topo);
00298     return false;
00299   }
00300 
00301   remove_fixed_gradients( topo, fm, g );
00302   return true;
00303 }
00304 
00305 bool IdealWeightMeanRatio::evaluate_with_Hessian_diagonal( PatchData& pd,
00306                     size_t handle,
00307                     double& m,
00308                     std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00309                     std::vector<Vector3D>& g,
00310                     std::vector<SymMatrix3D>& h,
00311                     MsqError& err )
00312 {
00313   const MsqMeshEntity* e = &pd.element_by_index(handle);
00314   EntityTopology topo = e->get_element_type();
00315 
00316   if (!analytical_average_hessian() &&
00317       topo != TRIANGLE &&
00318       topo != TETRAHEDRON) {
00319     static bool print = true;
00320     if (print) {
00321       MSQ_DBGOUT(1) << "Analyical gradient not available for selected averaging scheme. "
00322                     << "Using (possibly much slower) numerical approximation of gradient"
00323                     << " of quality metric. " << std::endl;
00324       print = false;
00325     }
00326     return QualityMetric::evaluate_with_Hessian_diagonal( pd, handle, m, indices, g, h, err );
00327   }
00328 
00329   const MsqVertex *vertices = pd.get_vertex_array(err);
00330   const size_t *v_i = e->get_vertex_index_array();
00331 
00332 
00333   Vector3D n;                   // Surface normal for 2D objects
00334 
00335   // Prism and Hex element descriptions
00336   static const int locs_pri[6][4] = {{0, 1, 2, 3}, {1, 2, 0, 4},
00337                                      {2, 0, 1, 5}, {3, 5, 4, 0},
00338                                      {4, 3, 5, 1}, {5, 4, 3, 2}};
00339   static const int locs_hex[8][4] = {{0, 1, 3, 4}, {1, 2, 0, 5},
00340                                      {2, 3, 1, 6}, {3, 0, 2, 7},
00341                                      {4, 7, 5, 0}, {5, 4, 6, 1},
00342                                      {6, 5, 7, 2}, {7, 6, 4, 3}};
00343 
00344   const Vector3D d_con(1.0, 1.0, 1.0);
00345 
00346   int i;
00347 
00348   bool metric_valid = false;
00349   const uint32_t fm = fixed_vertex_bitmap( pd, e, indices );
00350 
00351   m = 0.0;
00352 
00353   switch(topo) {
00354   case TRIANGLE:
00355     pd.get_domain_normal_at_element(e, n, err); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00356     n = n / n.length();         // Need unit normal
00357     mCoords[0] = vertices[v_i[0]];
00358     mCoords[1] = vertices[v_i[1]];
00359     mCoords[2] = vertices[v_i[2]];
00360     g.resize(3), h.resize(3);
00361     if (!h_fcn_2e(m, arrptr(g), mHessians, mCoords, n, a2Con, b2Con, c2Con)) return false;
00362     h[0] = mHessians[0].upper();
00363     h[1] = mHessians[3].upper();
00364     h[2] = mHessians[5].upper();
00365     break;
00366 
00367   case QUADRILATERAL:
00368     pd.get_domain_normal_at_element(e, n, err); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00369     n = n / n.length(); // Need unit normal
00370     for (i = 0; i < 4; ++i) {
00371       mCoords[0] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][0]]];
00372       mCoords[1] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][1]]];
00373       mCoords[2] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][2]]];
00374       if (!h_fcn_2i(mMetrics[i], mGradients+3*i, mHessians+6*i, mCoords, n,
00375                     a2Con, b2Con, c2Con, d_con)) return false;
00376     }
00377 
00378     g.resize(4), h.resize(4);
00379     m = average_corner_hessian_diagonals( QUADRILATERAL, fm, 4,
00380                                  mMetrics, mGradients, mHessians,
00381                                  arrptr(g), arrptr(h), err );
00382     MSQ_ERRZERO( err );
00383     break;
00384 
00385   case TETRAHEDRON:
00386     mCoords[0] = vertices[v_i[0]];
00387     mCoords[1] = vertices[v_i[1]];
00388     mCoords[2] = vertices[v_i[2]];
00389     mCoords[3] = vertices[v_i[3]];
00390     g.resize(4), h.resize(4);
00391     metric_valid = h_fcn_3e(m, arrptr(g), mHessians, mCoords, a3Con, b3Con, c3Con);
00392     if (!metric_valid) return false;
00393     h[0] = mHessians[0].upper();
00394     h[1] = mHessians[4].upper();
00395     h[2] = mHessians[7].upper();
00396     h[3] = mHessians[9].upper();
00397     break;
00398 
00399   case PYRAMID:
00400     for (i = 0; i < 4; ++i) {
00401       mCoords[0] = vertices[v_i[ i     ]];
00402       mCoords[1] = vertices[v_i[(i+1)%4]];
00403       mCoords[2] = vertices[v_i[(i+3)%4]];
00404       mCoords[3] = vertices[v_i[ 4     ]];
00405       metric_valid = h_fcn_3p(mMetrics[i], mGradients+4*i, 
00406                               mHessians+10*i, mCoords, a3Con, b3Con, c3Con);
00407       if (!metric_valid) return false;
00408     }
00409 
00410     g.resize(5), h.resize(5);
00411     m = average_corner_hessian_diagonals( PYRAMID, fm, 4,
00412                                  mMetrics, mGradients, mHessians,
00413                                  arrptr(g), arrptr(h), err );
00414     MSQ_ERRZERO( err );
00415     break;
00416 
00417   case PRISM:
00418     for (i = 0; i < 6; ++i) {
00419       mCoords[0] = vertices[v_i[locs_pri[i][0]]];
00420       mCoords[1] = vertices[v_i[locs_pri[i][1]]];
00421       mCoords[2] = vertices[v_i[locs_pri[i][2]]];
00422       mCoords[3] = vertices[v_i[locs_pri[i][3]]];
00423       if (!h_fcn_3w(mMetrics[i], mGradients+4*i, mHessians+10*i, mCoords,
00424                     a3Con, b3Con, c3Con)) return false;
00425     }
00426 
00427     g.resize(6), h.resize(6);
00428     m = average_corner_hessian_diagonals( PRISM, fm, 6,
00429                                  mMetrics, mGradients, mHessians,
00430                                  arrptr(g), arrptr(h), err );
00431     MSQ_ERRZERO( err );
00432     break;
00433 
00434   case HEXAHEDRON:
00435     for (i = 0; i < 8; ++i) {
00436       mCoords[0] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][0]]];
00437       mCoords[1] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][1]]];
00438       mCoords[2] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][2]]];
00439       mCoords[3] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][3]]];
00440       if (!h_fcn_3i(mMetrics[i], mGradients+4*i, mHessians+10*i, mCoords,
00441                     a3Con, b3Con, c3Con, d_con)) return false;
00442     }
00443 
00444     g.resize(8), h.resize(8);
00445     m = average_corner_hessian_diagonals( HEXAHEDRON, fm, 8,
00446                                  mMetrics, mGradients, mHessians,
00447                                  arrptr(g), arrptr(h), err );
00448     MSQ_ERRZERO( err );
00449     break;
00450 
00451   default:
00452     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT,
00453                     "Element type (%d) not supported in IdealWeightMeanRatio",
00454                     (int)topo);
00455     return false;
00456   } // end switch over element type
00457 
00458   remove_fixed_diagonals( topo, fm, g, h );
00459   return true;
00460 }

00462 
00463 bool IdealWeightMeanRatio::evaluate_with_Hessian( PatchData& pd,
00464                     size_t handle,
00465                     double& m,
00466                     std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00467                     std::vector<Vector3D>& g,
00468                     std::vector<Matrix3D>& h,
00469                     MsqError& err )
00470 {
00471 //  FUNCTION_TIMER_START(__FUNC__);
00472   const MsqMeshEntity* e = &pd.element_by_index(handle);
00473   EntityTopology topo = e->get_element_type();
00474 
00475   if (!analytical_average_hessian() &&
00476       topo != TRIANGLE &&
00477       topo != TETRAHEDRON) {
00478     static bool print = true;
00479     if (print) {
00480       MSQ_DBGOUT(1) << "Analyical gradient not available for selected averaging scheme. "
00481                     << "Using (possibly much slower) numerical approximation of gradient"
00482                     << " of quality metric. " << std::endl;
00483       print = false;
00484     }
00485     return QualityMetric::evaluate_with_Hessian( pd, handle, m, indices, g, h, err );
00486   }
00487 
00488   const MsqVertex *vertices = pd.get_vertex_array(err);
00489   const size_t *v_i = e->get_vertex_index_array();
00490 
00491 
00492   Vector3D n;                   // Surface normal for 2D objects
00493 
00494   // Prism and Hex element descriptions
00495   static const int locs_pri[6][4] = {{0, 1, 2, 3}, {1, 2, 0, 4},
00496                                      {2, 0, 1, 5}, {3, 5, 4, 0},
00497                                      {4, 3, 5, 1}, {5, 4, 3, 2}};
00498   static const int locs_hex[8][4] = {{0, 1, 3, 4}, {1, 2, 0, 5},
00499                                      {2, 3, 1, 6}, {3, 0, 2, 7},
00500                                      {4, 7, 5, 0}, {5, 4, 6, 1},
00501                                      {6, 5, 7, 2}, {7, 6, 4, 3}};
00502 
00503   const Vector3D d_con(1.0, 1.0, 1.0);
00504 
00505   int i;
00506 
00507   bool metric_valid = false;
00508   const uint32_t fm = fixed_vertex_bitmap( pd, e, indices );
00509 
00510   m = 0.0;
00511 
00512   switch(topo) {
00513   case TRIANGLE:
00514     pd.get_domain_normal_at_element(e, n, err); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00515     n = n / n.length();         // Need unit normal
00516     mCoords[0] = vertices[v_i[0]];
00517     mCoords[1] = vertices[v_i[1]];
00518     mCoords[2] = vertices[v_i[2]];
00519     g.resize(3), h.resize(6);
00520     if (!h_fcn_2e(m, arrptr(g), arrptr(h), mCoords, n, a2Con, b2Con, c2Con)) return false;
00521     break;
00522 
00523   case QUADRILATERAL:
00524     pd.get_domain_normal_at_element(e, n, err); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00525     n = n / n.length(); // Need unit normal
00526     for (i = 0; i < 4; ++i) {
00527       mCoords[0] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][0]]];
00528       mCoords[1] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][1]]];
00529       mCoords[2] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][2]]];
00530       if (!h_fcn_2i(mMetrics[i], mGradients+3*i, mHessians+6*i, mCoords, n,
00531                     a2Con, b2Con, c2Con, d_con)) return false;
00532     }
00533 
00534     g.resize(4), h.resize(10);
00535     m = average_corner_hessians( QUADRILATERAL, fm, 4,
00536                                  mMetrics, mGradients, mHessians,
00537                                  arrptr(g), arrptr(h), err );
00538     MSQ_ERRZERO( err );
00539     break;
00540 
00541   case TETRAHEDRON:
00542     mCoords[0] = vertices[v_i[0]];
00543     mCoords[1] = vertices[v_i[1]];
00544     mCoords[2] = vertices[v_i[2]];
00545     mCoords[3] = vertices[v_i[3]];
00546     g.resize(4), h.resize(10);
00547     metric_valid = h_fcn_3e(m, arrptr(g), arrptr(h), mCoords, a3Con, b3Con, c3Con);
00548     if (!metric_valid) return false;
00549     break;
00550 
00551   case PYRAMID:
00552     for (i = 0; i < 4; ++i) {
00553       mCoords[0] = vertices[v_i[ i     ]];
00554       mCoords[1] = vertices[v_i[(i+1)%4]];
00555       mCoords[2] = vertices[v_i[(i+3)%4]];
00556       mCoords[3] = vertices[v_i[ 4     ]];
00557       metric_valid = h_fcn_3p(mMetrics[i], mGradients+4*i, 
00558                               mHessians+10*i, mCoords, a3Con, b3Con, c3Con);
00559       if (!metric_valid) return false;
00560     }
00561 
00562     g.resize(5), h.resize(15);
00563     m = average_corner_hessians( PYRAMID, fm, 4,
00564                                  mMetrics, mGradients, mHessians,
00565                                  arrptr(g), arrptr(h), err );
00566     MSQ_ERRZERO( err );
00567     break;
00568 
00569   case PRISM:
00570     for (i = 0; i < 6; ++i) {
00571       mCoords[0] = vertices[v_i[locs_pri[i][0]]];
00572       mCoords[1] = vertices[v_i[locs_pri[i][1]]];
00573       mCoords[2] = vertices[v_i[locs_pri[i][2]]];
00574       mCoords[3] = vertices[v_i[locs_pri[i][3]]];
00575       if (!h_fcn_3w(mMetrics[i], mGradients+4*i, mHessians+10*i, mCoords,
00576                     a3Con, b3Con, c3Con)) return false;
00577     }
00578 
00579     g.resize(6), h.resize(21);
00580     m = average_corner_hessians( PRISM, fm, 6,
00581                                  mMetrics, mGradients, mHessians,
00582                                  arrptr(g), arrptr(h), err );
00583     MSQ_ERRZERO( err );
00584     break;
00585 
00586   case HEXAHEDRON:
00587     for (i = 0; i < 8; ++i) {
00588       mCoords[0] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][0]]];
00589       mCoords[1] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][1]]];
00590       mCoords[2] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][2]]];
00591       mCoords[3] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][3]]];
00592       if (!h_fcn_3i(mMetrics[i], mGradients+4*i, mHessians+10*i, mCoords,
00593                     a3Con, b3Con, c3Con, d_con)) return false;
00594     }
00595 
00596     g.resize(8), h.resize(36);
00597     m = average_corner_hessians( HEXAHEDRON, fm, 8,
00598                                  mMetrics, mGradients, mHessians,
00599                                  arrptr(g), arrptr(h), err );
00600     MSQ_ERRZERO( err );
00601     break;
00602 
00603   default:
00604     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT,
00605                     "Element type (%d) not supported in IdealWeightMeanRatio",
00606                     (int)topo);
00607     return false;
00608   } // end switch over element type
00609 
00610   remove_fixed_gradients( topo, fm, g );
00611   remove_fixed_hessians( topo, fm, h );
00612 //  FUNCTION_TIMER_END();
00613   return true;
00614 }
Generated on 14 Aug 2013 for MESQUITE by  1.4.7
